page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
THE INFORMATION WAS COMPILED AND RECORDED BY THE FOLLOWING CHILDREN OF BOLTON-ON SWALE CHURCH OF ENGLAND PRIMARY SCHOOL, SCORTON, RICHMOND, NORTH YORKSHIRE:
Zoe Smith Donna Hammond Darren Singleton Helen Sykes Sharon Cockfield Steven Brownlee Elizabeth Robson Henry Bookey Valerie Campbell Darren Trotter Nicola Cockfield Robert Ivin Gary Bruce
Their teacher,Mrs.Jean Gibson, would like to thank all who gave help and encouragement, especially Doctor Roy Heylings, Mr.Ronald Rawling and the headteacher Mrs.Anne Cowan.
